subject: Sales
title: Ethical Commerce Movements
description: A quick win: understand Ethical Commerce Movements.

hook.text: Patagonia donates profits to the planet. Toms gave shoes away. Ethics became a brand strategy.

buildup.text: Consumers increasingly choose brands aligned with their values, even at a significant premium.

discovery.text: Surveys show most millennials will pay more for sustainable products. Values now drive wallets.

twist.text: Greenwashing is the dark side: brands faking ethics for sales. Consumers are learning to spot fakes.

climax.text: Ethical selling isn't charity. It's competitive advantage. Genuine values create genuine loyalty.

punchline.text: Real ethics sell. Fake ethics get exposed.

quiz.question: What is greenwashing?
options: Brands falsely claiming ethical practices for marketing
